RAD_LOVS.LOV_QUERY: select rate_code,rate_code_desc from lftms_standard_rate_code where rate_type='S' and record_stat='O' and auth_stat='A'

SELECT a.FREQUENCY, a.RATE_CODE, a.units, a.CCY_CODE FROM LFTM_TENOR_CODE_MAINT a, lftm_rate_code_maint b WHERE a.RATE_CODE = ? AND a.CCY_CODE = ? and a.rate_code = b.rate_code and a.ccy_code = b.ccy_code and b.auth_stat = 'A'
